actions.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Veterans.

official_title: A bill to amend title 38, United States Code, to revise certain provisions relating to the appointment of clinical and counseling psychologist in the Veterans Health Administration, and for other purposes.

summary.text: Deletes provisions of Federal law requiring psychologists appointed for employment in the Veterans Health Administration to hold diplomas as diplomates in psychology from an accrediting authority approved by the Secretary of Veterans Affairs.

titles.title: A bill to amend title 38, United States Code, to revise certain provisions relating to the appointment of clinical and counseling psychologist in the Veterans Health Administration, and for other purposes.
